title: After windows 10 update/ weird in game jaggedness, and lagginess
body: hey everyone! Ever since I updated my computer with the new windows 10 update. I've been having this weird jaggedness/lagginess in game. So i started playing around with in game setting and when I turned off v sync and uncapped my fps, it stopped. But I've been having my v sync on and fps capped at 60 for the last 3 years. I have a 60htz monitor so i always capped at 60. Can anyone explain what might cause whats happening and why v sync off and fps uncapped fixed my problem?

replies.body: You might want to try some of these things [](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as Windows 10 updates many things of which we don't know and screws up many others. Or if you have free time, you can try to re-install LoL and see if it fixes your problem. :)
Windows 10 is pretty shit for gaming, especially after the anniversary update. Roll it back if you can, or look up solutions.
